subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: New Coach Al Bagnoli has players go through Friday walk-throughs on the campus’s South Lawn, reconnecting a team whose stadium is about 100 blocks away to its fan base.
snippet: New Coach Al Bagnoli has players go through Friday walk-throughs on the campus’s South Lawn, reconnecting a team whose stadium is about 100 blocks away to its fan base.
